law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000; and ch. 226, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 467, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/14/2000). This section was amended by 2000 Ky. Acts chs. 66 and 226, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
